public class SelectDesignProductEntry
extends java.lang.Object

Used to select a design product entry fro a tree of design products.

Constructor Detail

SelectDesignProductEntry

public SelectDesignProductEntry(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display,
                                boolean allowAdd)
Present the user with a tree of product components that they can select from.

Parameters:
display - - points back to the display
allowAdd - - true if they are allowed to add new components to the tree
Method Detail

populateTree

private void populateTree(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TreeItem node,
                          java.lang.String parentName)
Populates a component tree from the rationale database. This is a recursive method that calls itself to add new children to the current root node.

Parameters:
node - - the root node for the tree
parentName - - the name of the parent at the root node.

getSelEntry

public DesignProductEntry getSelEntry()
Returns the selected product component

the selected product component
